channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 1 – NYC (pictures only)
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Thanks a lot :)
I'm having problems with the host of the blog. Unfortunately I can't guarantee that the problems won't return. But I'll try to maintain it.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks a lot :)

I’m having problems with the host of the blog. Unfortunately I can’t guarantee that the problems won’t return. But I’ll try to maintain it.

item.title: By: 725176
item.description:
You and your dad look great!
I was looking for your words and as you know was surprised... but now everything is fine again.
Take care, enjoy, don't forget that your body has to adjust... don't hurry.
item.content:encoded:
You and your dad look great!

I was looking for your words and as you know was surprised… but now everything is fine again.

Take care, enjoy, don’t forget that your body has to adjust… don’t hurry.
